item.title: The Top 25 Multinational Workplaces consist of widely recognized brands
item.description:
Great Place to Work, a global firm that assists organizations in developing positive workplace cultures, has announced its yearly ranking of the top 25 multinational workplaces worldwide. This list is derived from an extensive study of workplace environments and recognizes companies with exceptional work cultures. To be eligible for this list, companies must meet specific requirements: placement on at least five national “Best Workplaces” lists, a minimum of 5,000 employees, and a workforce comprised of at least 40% employees based outside of the company’s home country...

item.title: The top 10 workplaces in Singapore have been revealed
item.description:

In addition to the new report, Singapore Insights 2015, Great Place to Work Institute Singapore has unveiled its first-ever 10 Best Companies to Work For in Singapore List.
